condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to be the leader for risk communication and community engagement (RCCE). Indeed, the institution supported the national communication structure on Covid-19, to develop and implement communication strategies promoting demand for vaccination, and to fight against Covid-19. The conduct of social surveys on a representative sample of the population (1,635 people) regarding the social and behavioral determinants surrounding the COVID-19 vaccine, the support for the green line call services, the social listening, the setting up of the clubs of the young reporters, all carried out by UNICEF, supported the data feedback and the national response system to Covid-19. | Status:Met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
